metadata.title: CVE-2018-1297 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: When using Distributed Test only (RMI based), Apache JMeter 2.x and 3.xuses an unsecured RMI connection. This could allow an attacker to getAccess to JMeterEngine and send unauthorized code.

criterions.comment: jakarta-jmeter: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
